title: China warns of a 'necessary response' to a trade war
text:
China warns of a 'necessary response' to a trade war 10:42am GMT - 01:39 
China's Foreign Minister said Beijing will respond as necessary in the event of a trade war with the United States, and warned such a war would only harm all sides. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China's Foreign Minister said Beijing will respond as necessary in the event of a trade war with the United States, and warned such a war would only harm all sides. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2oYrKHW
